title: Shreya Ghoshal “All Hearts Tour" - Bengaluru
subtitle: By Superhits 93.5 RED FM
location: Bellandur, Outer Ring Road, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560103, India
description:
Superhits 93.5 RED FM brings Shreya Ghoshal, All hearts tour Bengaluru RED LIVE
in Concert Co-presented by Kalaluha.
Let's experience the magic of Shreya Ghoshal's All Hearts Tour in Namma
Bengaluru. Prepare to be captivated by the mesmerizing blend of Shreya Ghoshal's
soulful voice and magnetic stage presence, accompanied by a talented band that
infuses energy and finesse into every performance.

title: Ridiculous - Stand Up Comedy Show
location: 178, 5th Main Rd, Binnamangala, Hoysala Nagar, Indiranagar
description: About the show: Prepare yourself for an unforgettable evening of laughter as "Ridiculous" takes center stage with four of the wittiest stand-up comedians hailing from the vibrant city of Bangalore. Join us for a comedy extravaganza that blends the city`s tech-savvy charm, cultural quirks, and the unique flavor of everyday life. Ridiculous promises an evening filled with relatable humor delivered with the unique comedic flair that sets Bangalore`s stand-up comedy scene apart.

title: Brews of Bangalore by BuzzinUp
subtitle: Bangalore's first ever beer and coffee festival
location: Sangeetha Sabha, 4th Cross Rd, 8th cross, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar
description: 🍺☕🎸 BuzzinUp's Multi-Brand Beer & Coffee Extravaganza at Indiranagar Club on May 5th promises Bangalore's ultimate beverage celebration! Dive into a selection of craft beers from Toit, Geist, Kingfisher, Bira91, Mannheim, Red Rhino, and IST. 🍻 Pair these with delectable bites from Plan B, Brik Oven, Big Chow, Nizaam Rolls, and Neon Market. 🍕🍔 Enjoy three live bands and a host of games and activities throughout the day. Don't miss this vibrant festival of fun, camaraderie, and the finest brews and bites at Brews of Bangalore! 🥳🎉

title: Jingle Land
subtitle: The Land of Music and Entertainment
location: Palm Meadows, Prestige Ozone, Whitefield Main Road, Whitefield, Devasandra Industrial Estate, Krishnarajapura
description:
Hello Music Enthusiasts! JINGLE LAND is here!
Experience the electrifying atmosphere of a musical extravaganza as diverse bands unite on one stage. Vibrant melodies fill the air, ranging from soulful ballads to heart-pounding rhythms. Enthusiastic crowds sway in harmony, immersed in the pulsating energy of live performances. Each band will bring its unique flair, captivating audiences with its raw talent and infectious passion.

title: ‘Vari’ Album Release Concert - Bengaluru
location: 16th Cross Rd, Vyalikaval, Kodandarampura, Malleshwara,
description: Varijashree's eponymous original music album “VARI” set for release in May 2024 on GroundUp Music, USA, produced by Grammy® Award Winning artist Michael League of Snarky Puppy is a conjunction of Indian music and Global music presented on the sonic platter of Indian classical and folk percussion. The heart and soul of the album lie in its sound with a mission to transcend boundaries.

title: Social Symphony by LEA- II 90s vs 2k Tamil Concert
location: XH4F+675, Krishna Rajendra Rd, Chikkanna Garden, Basavanagudi

title: Nikhita Gandhi Live In Concert
location: Phoenix Marketcity, Palm Meadows, Prestige Ozone, Whitefield Main Road, Whitefield, Devasandra Industrial Estate, Krishnarajapura

title: SCC SkyCinema - Before Sunrise
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 1/2, Old Madras Rd, Halasuru, Someshwarpura, Sivanchetti Gardens, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008
description:
"I believe if there's any kind of God, it wouldn't be in any of us. Not you or me, but just this little space in between." - Before Sunrise 

Step into a realm where the enchanting allure of cinema meets the breathtaking skyline of Bangalore. Sunset Cinema Club proudly invites you to join us for an unforgettable experience as we unveil our premiere show at 1 mg - Lido Mall.

Enjoy your favourite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of 1 mg- Lido Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

title: SCC SkyCinema - Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 1/2, Old Madras Rd, Halasuru, Someshwarpura, Sivanchetti Gardens, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008
description:
"""Life mein jitna bhi try karo, kuch na kuch toh chhootega hi. Toh jahaan hai, wahi ka maza lete hai.""- Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani

Witness the heartwarming tale of Bunny and Naina as they navigate the complexities of love and friendship. Experience the highs and lows, the laughter and tears with Sunset Cinema Club at 1 mg - Lido Mall.

Enjoy your favourite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of 1 mg- Lido Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

title: CrossOver ft. Guy Mantzur
subtitle: Father Of Progressive Techno GUY MANTZUR
location: Passport office, Mantri Avenue, next to Koramangala, KHB Games Village, Koramangala
description: Excitement fills us as we bring the Father Of Progressive Techno GUY MANTZUR to Bangalore, marking its inaugural appearance at Sunburn Union for our CrossOver Edition this May. 🍾

title: SCC SkyCinema - 50 First Dates
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 1/2, Old Madras Rd, Halasuru, Someshwarpura, Sivanchetti Gardens, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008
description:
"I just want you to know, I would never do anything to hurt you intentionally. And I will always cherish you." - 50 First Dates

Rediscover the magic of love with an outdoor movie experience that stays with you .. Forever! Prepare for a heartwarming experience as Sunset Cinema Club presents the screening of this classic at 1 mg - Lido Mall.

Enjoy your favourite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of 1 mg- Lido Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

title: SCC SkyCinema - Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 1/2, Old Madras Rd, Halasuru, Someshwarpura, Sivanchetti Gardens, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008
description:
"Seize the day, my friend. Pehle is din ko poori tarah jiyo, phir chalis ke bare mein sochna." - Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara

Prepare to embark on a cinematic adventure like never before as Sunset Cinema Club presents the screening of this classic at 1 mg - Lido Mall. Get ready to indulge your senses and immerse yourself in the magic of the silver screen under the open sky.

Enjoy your favourite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of 1 mg- Lido Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

title: SCC Picnic Cinema - 30 Years Of Pulp Fiction
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 82/2, Gantiganahalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560064
description:
"I'm Winston Wolfe. I solve problems." - Pulp Fiction

Step into the world of crime, chaos and cool with Sunset Cinema Club as we celebrate 30 years of this iconic movie! Join us for a night of cinematic nostalgia, where we pay tribute to Quentin Tarantino's masterpiece under the starlit sky at Garden City Beer Collective (GCBC).

Come for an evening of cinematic delight, as the sun goes down, and the show comes on! Enjoy a picnic-y ambiance, where you can sit or even lie down on comfy bean bags, surrounded by lush green grass! String lights illuminate the area, casting a warm glow that sets the perfect mood for the evening, while you enjoy your favourite film on a large screen with surround sound accompanied with delicious munchies and drinks!

title: SCC Picnic Cinema - 20 Years Of Hum Tum
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 82/2, Gantiganahalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560064
description:
"Hum aur tum agar saath ho, phir mushqilain kaisi hain? Hum aur tum agar saath ho, phir mushqilain kaisi hain?" -Hum Tum 

Sunset Cinema Club invites you to join us as we celebrate two decades of love, laughter and memories with our special screening of ""Hum Tum""! Marking the 20th anniversary of this beloved romantic comedy, we invite you to relive the magic of Rhea and Karan's journey at Garden City Beer Collective (GCBC).

Come for an evening of cinematic delight, as the sun goes down, and the show comes on! Enjoy a picnic-y ambiance, where you can sit or even lie down on comfy bean bags, surrounded by lush green grass! String lights illuminate the area, casting a warm glow that sets the perfect mood for the evening, while you enjoy your favourite film on a large screen with surround sound accompanied with delicious munchies and drinks!

title: SCC Picnic Cinema - Jab We Met
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: Whitefield Main Rd, Thigalarapalya, Krishnarajapura, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560067
description:
"Mein Apni Favourite Hoon” - Jab We Met 

All aboard for a night of love, laughter, and unforgettable moments as we bring you the iconic Bollywood masterpiece. Sunset Cinema Club invites you to join us for a cinematic experience that will touch your heart and leave you with a smile at Nexus Shantiniketan. 

Located in the heart of Whitefield, this bustling mall transforms into a haven of relaxation and entertainment as the sun sets and the stars begin to emerge, and your movie screening begins. Enjoy your favourite film on a large screen with surround sound, as you sink into comfy bean bags or mattresses, in the great outdoors.

title: SoMAD Y2K Ft. Shiva Manvi & Friends
subtitle: An Early 2000s ThrowBack Party
location: 963, 12th Main Rd, HAL 2nd Stage, Doopanahalli, Indiranagar
description:
Step into a time machine and journey back to the early 2000s at our Y2K throwback party! 💿🎉 Relive the era of frosted tips, low-rise jeans, and Nokia phones as we groove to the iconic beats of the 2000s.

Break out your best denim-on-denim ensemble and get ready to dance the night away to hits from artists like Beyoncé, Usher, and Destiny's Child. It's a nostalgia-filled celebration you won't want to miss! #Y2KThrowback #PartyLikeIts2000""

On the Decks we have Shiva Manvi spinning the sickest Audio Visual set this edition, let’s make this the Party of the year!

subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: Konanakunte Cross Metro Station, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunte, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560062
description:
"Kissi manzar par mein rukka nahin

Kabhi khud se bhi mila nahin

Yeh gilla toh hai mein khafa nahin

Sheher ek se gaon ek se, Log ek se, naam ek” - Rockstar

subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on

description:
"Dark and difficult times lie ahead. Soon we must all face the choice between what is right and what is easy." - Harry Potter And The Goblet Of Fire 

Sunset Cinema Club Invites you to immerse yourself in the heart-pounding action of the Triwizard Tournament as it unfolds on the big screen. Feel the magic and excitement of the wizarding world in this pivotal installment of the Harry Potter series at Forum South Bangalore Mall.

Sunset Cinema Club invites you to embark on an extraordinary adventure with the screening of this classic at Garden City Beer Collective (GCBC). Join us for an evening of imagination, inspiration, and self-discovery under the open sky.

title: Kannada Utsava | Open Mic| Live Jamming
subtitle: The biggest Kannada open mic and jamming is back!
location: 1335, 8th Main Rd, opp. to Bangalore Hand Centre and Maya ENT clinic, A Block, Milk Colony, 2nd Stage, Rajajinagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560010
description:
Namaskara Ellarigu!

Swagata, to dowithlit's Kannada Utsava - a gathering to celebrate Kannada Art. The event will have Open Mic, Live Kannada Jamming (one of the firsts in Bengaluru ever) and Fun Activities!

Open Mic involves the best poets, storytellers, musicians and comedians all performing their originals in Kannada. The vibe of the event is creative, happiness and positivity all around. Our Kannada shows have been graced by some amazing stars of the Kannada entertainment industry - Sangeetha Sringeri, Harini Sreekanth, Ranjani Raghavan, Niranjan Deshpande, Midhun Mukundhan, Vijay Lakshmi, Kalyan Manjunath, Nayana Nagaraj and many others, and they have all loved it!

title: SoMAD LAB Ft. Arthi, camoufly, Kampai
subtitle: An Exclusive Pool Party [Limited to 150+ Individuals only]
location: Oia, Hennur Main Road, New Airport Rd, opposite Mantri Webcity
description:
When the temperatures rise, there’s nothing better than a cool dip in the pool to beat the heat. The city's most pioneering Music and Lifestyle media brand introduces SOMAD Pool Parties, the perfect destination to get wet and wild. This SoMAD stellar event boasts fan favorite DJs spinning groovy music, delectable cuisines & classy cocktails along with deluxe pools, vibrant decor, and a high spirited milieu.

A perfect blend of exuberance and extravagance, SoMAD Pool Party is the most popular destination to fraternize with top models, designers, influencers and elite fashionistas whilst offering an extraordinary escapade from the sweltering heat of summer, bestowing exquisite luxuries and amenities.
With SOMADS extravagant, classy, and elegant style, coupled with wildness and unconstraint, SoMAD Pool Parties are an impassable offer for the masses.

title: Karaoke Nights
subtitle: Ft KJ Naveen
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Have you ever let your inner bathroom singer play for the rest of the world?
If not, our Karaoke Nights are the perfect opportunity to let loose and sing like no one is watching with a group of people who care about your passion of singing and want to share it with you.
Bring your friends and family to Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru for an unforgettable Karaoke night.

title: Fee Fi Fo Funk
subtitle: Progressive Rock
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Catch Fee FI FO Funk playing live on 2nd May i.e. Thursday, 8:30 pm onwards only at Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru.
⚡️Join us for an evening full of great music, lip-smacking food & refreshing cocktails.

title: Boogie Nights
subtitle: Ft Prashu
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Make some noise and have fun, since the music gets two times better when a DJ lifts his hands in the air.
Every Friday night, starting at 8:30 p.m., Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru is happy to host DJ PRASHU and his incredible sounds for the musically charged Blockbusters.
Prepare to party and enjoy the evening with excellent food, live music, and cool drinks.

title: Tribute to Ed Sheeran & Coldplay
subtitle: Ft Nikhil Vai Collective
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Join us for a fantastic musical evening honoring Coldplay, one of the most successful and well-liked bands of all time, presented by the nimble and potent NIKHIL VAI COLLECTIVE. Since its formation in 1996, this British rock group reached the top of the rock/pop music world in the early 21st Century and has continued to win the hearts of so many with its melodic piano-driven anthems.
Now get ready to prepare yourself to hear them in a classical interpretation like never before.
Get ready to be taken to `Paradise`!
If you’re a Coldplay fan, (how can you not be?) then join us for this memorable night at Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru.

title: Chronic Blues Circus
subtitle: Jazz & Blues, Vintage Rock
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Bangalore`s oldest band, the Chronic Blues Circus, has been performing continuously since 1991. Jazz and blues, vintage pop, soul, reggae, rock n roll, soft rock, and folk music are among their most popular genres. Bob Dylan, JJ Cale, Bob Marley, and the Grateful Dead have all been honored by the band.
The event promises to be a fantastic evening of dancing, music, and fun!
See you at Hard Rock Cafe St. Marks, Bengaluru

subtitle: Ft Fernandes Band
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Celebrate a night with Pop & Rock hits of the 90`s & 2000`s era performed by FERNANDES.
What better way to spend a night than to unwind and listen to the Pop & Rock hits of the '90s and 2000s era? A tribute to the classic hits that have reinvented the RnB scene is something you wouldn`t want to miss out on. A night filled with groovy tunes and exceptional musicians awaits you.
Grab your tickets to be part of one of the most soulful nights Bengaluru will ever witness!
Be there to experience the chaos and dance to the band`s incredible beats.

title: Tribute to Shreya Ghoshal
subtitle: Ft Agneyastra
location: Unit G 25 & 26, Ground Floor, Park Square Mall, International Tech Park, Pattandur Agrahara, Whitefield, Bangalore
description:
Agneyastra is a Multi-Lingual Indie Rock Live Musical Band formed in the Year 2019 with musicians from Western and Indian Classical backgrounds, creating an exciting cross-genre musical experience.
Agneyastra is more inclined to Sandalwood and Bollywood Music covering all Genres of Music and has performed across various platforms from Major Corporates to College fests to popular venues.
The band has off-late worked on some existing projects which include a fan-based song anthem for one of the most popular IPL franchises RCB and an anthem for the INDIAN CRICKET TEAM.
The band also has been associated with many top Musical artists in the South Indian Music industry including Vijay Prakash, Raghu Dixit, GV Prakash, and many more from the film Industry.

title: Tribute to Pink Floyd
subtitle: Ft Meduza
location: Unit G 25 & 26, Ground Floor, Park Square Mall, International Tech Park, Pattandur Agrahara, Whitefield, Bangalore
description:
Home, home again! You`d like to be here while you can!!!!

Hold your breath and start counting down the days before you witness the tribute night, and this time it`s to none other than Pink Floyd!
Pink Floyd was the pioneer of psychedelic music and one of the biggest selling acts ever on the planet. The group acquired a sensational reputation by performing sound & light shows and built a cult following that continues to grow even after years of the bands breaking up.

Join us for an evening full of unforgettable music, and tremendous vibes and catch Meduza playing live hits of PINK FLOYD only at the Hard Rock Cafe, Whitefield, Bengaluru

title: Chai Pe Charcha
subtitle: Sip, Share and Sparkle!
location: 18th Main Road, 138/B, 5th Cross Rd, KHB Colony, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: Sit around a table, in a cozy little space and enjoy a cup of Chai while connecting with people through heart to hearts and other touching conversations. It`s a cozy little meet up for people who just want to get to know others and have good conversations. If you want to make new friends over Chai, come join us.

title: Canvas Painting
subtitle: Unleash your creativity!
location: 18th Main Road, 138/B, 5th Cross Rd, KHB Colony, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: Calling all art enthusiasts! Immerse yourself in a vibrant canvas painting workshop that will Ignite your creativity and bring your artistic vision to life! No prior experience needed! Whether you`re a beginner eager to dip your brush into the world of painting or a seasoned artist looking to refine your skills. This workshop is designed for artists of all levels. Take home your unique creation and cherish the memories
